interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [Abib] Creme coating mask Tone-up solution 17g (5pcs)
Review Date: 2020/07/26
Store: Abib
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Abib', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 6.2 x 0.8 inches; 8.01 Ounces'}
Review Text: I’ve used Abib’s cooling masks before. I think like this toning mask sheets more. Because, the mask sheets are thick, lock all the moistures while wearing the mask sheets, leave soft and smooth skin afterward. I didn’t notice dramatic tone-up effect. But, overall I love the concept of the mask sheet, very moisturizing they are. I wish Abib company could minimize the packing later on. Other than that I’m very happy with these non drying your skin masks!
Review Title: Suitable for dry skin
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LDR by Baysyx - Restorative Glow Hydro Boost Moisturizer | Nourishing Hydration Cream with Collagen Stimulation | Fortified with Hyaluronic Acid | Made in The USA from Natural Ingredients (1.7 Oz) LDR {'Brand': 'LDR', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.2 x 1.1 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '725835779579', 'Manufacturer': 'LDR'} According to this Biomarine Hydro Boost moisturizer bottle, this moisturizer is made with natural ingredients that help stimulate collagen production to fill in fine lines and wrinkles, while helping to keep your face moisturized. As they claimed I’ve been putting this moisturizer day and night time. It’s a bit early to tell if my fine lines and wrinkles are reduced. However, my face was hydrated after use without having any skin issues. My husband is struggling with dry skin lately due to the weather. I recommend him to use this since this product is for men and women. He’s been liking this moisturizer. He said this has decent scents without being too overwhelming. My husband and I both like this moisturizer. I would recommend to people. Decent face moisturizer Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'} Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis, Face Toner contains Rose, orange blossom, cornflower and hamamelis natural origin flower waters purify and tone the skin after cleansing. I found this Eau de Beaut Rosamlis leaves a very soft and comfortable skin, its texture is tighter, and the complexion is glowing and fresh. I use this toner to refresh skin at any time during the day. This toner is light weigh and very gentle on the skin. I really like this toner! Great daily facial toner 24K Gold Under Eye Mask - Eye Patches Treatment for Puffy Eyes Pure Collagen Golden Anti-aging Dark Circles Eye Bags Wrinkles Pads Masks Cooling Eye Spa Hydrogel Undereye patch - 20 Pairs (GOLD) MOSTORY {'Brand': 'MOSTORY', 'Item Form': 'Pads', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti Aging', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Special Feature': 'Anti Aging', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.86 x 1.65 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} I get super puffy very often especially in the mornings. I popped these open before I put on make up. I didn’t see much differences. Except cooling since they were in the refrigerator. The product is made in China as well. If someone is interested in where it’s made. Okay ABOUT ME MediAnswer Collagen Firming Up Mask 4ea (1box) 25g - 77% Pure Collagen Extract Anti-Aging Total Care Facial Mask Sheet, Powerful Hydrating and Anti-Wrinkle Night Skin Care Samyang {'Brand': 'Samyang', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 6.3 x 0.9 inches; 0.88 Ounces'} ABOUT ME MediAnswer Collagen Firming Up Mask is made with 77% Pure Collagen Extract The collagen supposed to help Anti-Aging Total Care, Powerful Hydrating and Anti-Wrinkle. I like the mask sheets. The sheets are very interesting without being messy. These masked helped me a lot to calm my skins after getting lots of sun from Florida. I would recommend these masks Collagen! Cancun Collection Cacao Body Bronzer – Superfood Infused Sunless Tanning Lotion with Cacao 5.1 fl.oz, For Instant Tan in 1 minute. Cancun Collection {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.6 x 1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986640'} This is my first time using Cancun collection body bronzer. I have to say I love this product! I have odd patch between my neck and chest area. This body bronzer did great job on hiding and blending into my body without looking crazy. This bronzer did not make me look like an orange either. I like the clean ingredients that this bronzer contains. I would recommend this bronzer. So far I am in love with this!

++ I would recommend to apply this bronzer with a bronzer glove if can. That’s the best way to get the best result. Superfood infused! [the SAEM] Derma Plan Cleansing Bubble Pad 15pcs - One Step Gentle Makeup Cleansing Wipes Produce Fine & Dense Bubbles, Hypoallergenic Formula, Pore Clean, Mild Exfoliation THESAEM {'Brand': 'THESAEM', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 3.9 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I never used the SEAM’s skin products before. I told myself why not try one?! So I did! The pads are bigger than my goto face cleaning pads which I really like. One pad does a long way around my face even to neckline. This bottle has got plenty of liquid to work on. Also, I didn’t notice any irritation after using this bottle. Overall, I like the scent, it is mild. Also, I like the inexpensive price point. This bottle works for me. I hope my review helps! Inexpensive, great daily face pads Easydew 2-Step Face Contour Sheet Mask - Tightening & Anti-Aging & Hydrating Korean Face Mask with DW-EGF, Hyaluronic Acid for Anti-Winkle, Reducing Fine Line & Producing Collagen (Qty 5) EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 6.38 x 0.63 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EETS1003', 'Manufacturer': 'CleveAid'} My friend told me about this brand and this face masks. I was so curious to try. I am in my 30’s now. I do happen to use a lot more of anti wrinkle products these days. I like the masks because the ingredients are good for anti wrinkle, I noticed the masks moisturize well after use them. I like the concept and the ingredients as well. I am going to have to purchase more in the future after I run out! Worth the hype! [Abib] Creme coating mask Tone-up solution 17g (5pcs) Abib {'Brand': 'Abib', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 6.2 x 0.8 inches; 8.01 Ounces'} I’ve used Abib’s cooling masks before. I think like this toning mask sheets more. Because, the mask sheets are thick, lock all the moistures while wearing the mask sheets, leave soft and smooth skin afterward. I didn’t notice dramatic tone-up effect. But, overall I love the concept of the mask sheet, very moisturizing they are. I wish Abib company could minimize the packing later on. Other than that I’m very happy with these non drying your skin masks! Suitable for dry skin
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor skincare products focused on moisturization and freshening effects, particularly enjoying sheet masks with hydrating and anti-wrinkle benefits. They also appreciate cream formulations and toners, as well as body bronzers made from natural ingredients for sunless tanning.

- **Ingredients:** They prioritize products that contain natural components conducive to collagen stimulation and gentle purifying effects, with a consistent emphasis on anti-aging and skin improvement.

- **Usage:** The user integrates skincare into morning and nighttime routines, now valuing thicker sheet masks that retain moisture while enhancing softness and smoothness. This is alongside their regimen of gentle cleansing pads and bronzers.

- **Performance Expectations:** They seek visible results in reducing fine lines and wrinkles, while appreciating immediate cooling and hydrating effects.

- **Sharing & Recommendations:** The user actively shares their experiences with family, discussing product efficacy and recommending hydrating and moisturizing sheet masks, while also advocating for affordable daily cleansing solutions.

- **Scent Preference:** They prefer moderate and fresh scents, aligning with their choices, although they are open to unscented options that deliver effective results.

- **Family Considerations:** The user seeks versatile products suitable for all family members, reflecting a practical approach to skincare with effective solutions.

Overall, the user maintains a strong focus on quality, effectiveness, and versatility, embracing a variety of products that enhance hydration and promote a natural glow while prioritizing moisture retention.
